sentence.Network_en: An aureole of romance plays about him.

sentence.Network_en: You, will load the aureole of the hero forever.

sentence.Network_en: Is you it that bright aureole that dim?
sentence.Network_cn: 是那璀璨的光环暗淡了 吗 ?

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English : from Old French aureole, from Latin aureola (corona) 'golden (crown)', feminine of aureolus (diminutive of aureus, from aurum 'gold')

means.word_mean: 1. the outermost region of the sun's atmosphere; visible as a white halo during a solar eclipse
2. an indication of radiant light drawn around the head of a saint
